meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the bullae on my skin were caused by a burn.
meanings.sent2: She carefully popped the bullae on her foot to relieve the pressure.
meanings.sent3: The bullae on the bubble wrap made it fun to pop.
meanings.sent4: The bullae of water on the leaf shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The bullae on the surface of the soup indicated it was too hot to eat.

meanings.definition: A rounded swelling on a bone, especially on the skull.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologist discovered ancient bullae on the skull during the excavation.
meanings.sent2: The bump on his head turned out to be a bullae from the injury.
meanings.sent3: The bullae on the dinosaur skull made it look like it had horns.
meanings.sent4: The bullae on the bone felt like a small mountain under his touch.
meanings.sent5: The bullae on the skull were a sign of the ancient warrior's bravery.
